overview: David Moss is a co-founder of People Power Company with 14-years experience in in wireless sensornets, electrical engineering, computer science, embedded systems, and technology integration with business development. David is the author of several pending patents at People Power, and a co-author on the ‘Collection Tree Protocol’ publication for one of the most efficient, reliable, and widely used open-source wireless mesh networking protocols. Prior to People Power, David worked with Rincon Research Corporation leading the sensornet engineering team to architect and deploy miniature low-power wireless sensors in some of the most rugged and challenging environments ever faced by sensornet developers. David worked with Bitfone Corporation as both a Java developer and firmware engineer where he integrated Bitfone’s revolutionary Over-the-Air Firmware Updates into tens of millions of Motorola cell phones that are currently shipping around the world.
